title: Mathematical Competency Assessment Process Utilizing Resource-Centered Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical computation skills and problem-solving strategy comprehension
context.additional_context: Design and implementation of real-time interaction and resource-centered assessment using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can solve math problems organized according to resource-based design principles with 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain at least three problem-solving strategies that reduce cognitive load.
Learners can apply methods to minimize the impact of working memory during assessments, improving problem-solving efficiency by 20%.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
